notesStmt.note: A translation, by Anthony Munday, of Antoine de La Faye's: Brief traicté de la vertu de la croix et de la manière de l'honnorer. La Faye's treatise is a refutation of Francis de Sales's 'Défense de l'estendart de la Saincte Croix'.
A variant: the dedication is signed by the translator, Anthony Munday--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
